segments.text: I notice the boy reaching into the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, even though the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get caught any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don’t want to be the one to ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really pushing his luck with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
